title: Crispy Sweet Potato Wedges
description: Roasted sweet potato wedges with paprika and garlic — crispy edges, soft centers, and a perfect pairing for shish taouk.
ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes, cut into thick wedges
Optional: 1/4 tsp cumin for a more Middle Eastern profile
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment.
Cut sweet potatoes into thick, even wedges to ensure uniform cooking.
In a large bowl, toss wedges with olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and optional cumin.
Spread wedges on the baking sheet, cut side down, without overlapping.
Roast for 25–30 minutes, flipping halfway, until edges are crisp and centers are tender.
notes: For even crispier results, soak the raw wedges in cold water for 20 minutes, then pat dry before seasoning. Air fryer option: 400°F for 15–18 minutes, shaking halfway.
